host_description_text: Easily take control of your host no matter where you are via our mobile application.
data_description_text: View your host's status data in real time as well as all of its activity on the Sia network.
network_description_text: You can visualize the state of the Sia network as well as all the exchanges of the hosts.
login_description_text: To start interacting with the Sia network, please enter the public address of your server
